formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.

formElement.label: Application Slug:
formElement.documentation: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.

formElement.label: Email:
formElement.documentation: The email address of the collaborator to add.

formElement.label: Role:
formElement.documentation: The access level for the collaborator. Accepted values are collaborator or administrator.
